Episodes.Title: Inked in Blood
Episodes.Plot: A tattoo artist is gunned down during a robbery. The survivor of the robbery gives detectives street names and stencils to help in the hunt. With multiple suspects to identify and catch detectives have a long road ahead of them.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Double Time
Episodes.Plot: The detectives are called to the scene of a shooting at a caf√©. The witnesses on scene say it was a robbery gone wrong. While working one case, the team gets a second case. The are working against the clock on both cases.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Dead Sleep/Tag Team
Episodes.Plot: A body is found brutally beaten. Detectives have to identify the victim and search for a killer. A local teenager is killed. Detectives enlist the help of some eyes in the sky for help tracking their killer.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Unnecessary Roughness/Stolen Life
Episodes.Plot: Gunfire rings out leaving a teenager dead, ironically during a Children's Peace Bowl for street violence. With little to go on detectives need a witness to come forward. A popular basketball coach is gunned down, detectives are left scratching their heads. Leads are few and far between, can detectives find their killer?

Episodes.Title: Burden of Proof/Backfire
Episodes.Plot: A woman is shot and killed in her home. The detectives find the victims car with a suspect behind the wheel. Holding the suspect on stolen property can the gather enough evidence for murder? When two men try to rob a vender one is shot and killed. Once the trigger man is found they need the second robber to put all the piece together.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: American Dream/Easter Sunday
Episodes.Plot: A man is found dead in his truck. Detectives learn that he had fled the war in Bosnia, just to killed in the streets of Memphis. The streets are hard and young people fight to break the hold the streets have on them. A young father was doing just that when he was gunned down and left in the back of a car.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and drug references

Episodes.Title: Better Days/Wildflower
Episodes.Plot: The local community is shocked when an elderly man is gunned down. With the help of the locals two suspects are brought in. Their tight lips will make the detectives jobs even harder. A woman is outside collecting wildflowers when she is shot and killed. With little to go on, detectives unravel leads which seems to make the case even hard to solve.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and drug references

Episodes.Title: Last Ride/Trailer Trap
Episodes.Plot: A young man is gunned down and left in the trunk of an abandoned car. Can his killer be found? The brutal killing of a man in a trailer park sends detectives searching for a killer.

Episodes.Title: Lured In/Disaster
Episodes.Plot: A man is robbed and left for dead in a motel bathroom. Detectives have little to go on, and rely on the victims missing items to lead to their killer. Gunshots ring out in the middle of the afternoon in a residential neighborhood. Finally a witness steps up and says she saw a man flee the scene.

Episodes.Title: Dropped Call/Derailed
Episodes.Plot: A young man lay shot dead in the middle of a street. Can a cell phone and a pawnshop ticket hold the clues detectives will need? The body of a woman is found dumped on some railroad tracks. Detectives are shocked when a tip comes in that someone may be holding out on them. They are convinced when they learn this person knows things they shouldn't know unless they are the killer.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Shell Shocked/Cradle to Grave
Episodes.Plot: A sting operation is put in motion to catch a killer. A brutal execution goes down in the middle of a busy neighborhood.

Episodes.Title: Ashes and Snow
Episodes.Plot: The tragic murder of a woman strangled just days before Christmas has detectives scrambling for clues. To make matters worse their killer burned the car the victim was in and there is a snowstorm looming.

Episodes.Title: Deal Breaker/Gunplay
Episodes.Plot: A family man is robbed then shot and killed. Detectives hunt for his killer. A local high school kid is gunned down in cold blood as he walks home with him friends. Now detectives a hunting for two suspects.

Episodes.Title: Frenzy/Hard Truth
Episodes.Plot: Two men lay dead in the middle of a busy street. The roommate of the two victims is missing and detectives think he may hold a clue about the murders. One man is dead and another is wounded. With limited leads and witnesses they hold out hope the survivor will be able to identify the shooter.

Episodes.Title: Last Fare
Episodes.Plot: A young father-to-be is robbed and killed, detectives are hot on the tail of the killers because of a tip. Can detectives locate their killers before they leave the country?

Episodes.Title: Last Night Out/Death Do Us Part
Episodes.Plot: One young man is dead and another young man is seen fleeing the scene. Detectives rely on eye witnesses to identify this killer, and bring him to justice. A young mother is shot dead in her vehicle. Her year old twins crying from the back of the vehicle. They leads are more mysterious than they are helpful but every single one is followed up on to catch this killer.

Episodes.Title: Lester Street
Episodes.Plot: Four adults and two children lay dead in was is being called the worst mass murder in 15 years. Detectives scramble for clues and learn the deaths may be gang related. Can detectives locate these killers for before they take anyone else out?

Episodes.Title: Bail Out/Seeing Red
Episodes.Plot: Lt. Armstrong and his team investigate Memphis' worst mass murder in 15 years; the investigation points to a gang-ordered directive to kill an entire family.
